originalText.text: I recently used Equinox Air Conditioning for a refrigeration system installation, and I was extremely satisfied with the level of service provided by the team. They were knowledgeable, efficient, and professional, and they were able to install the system with minimal disruption. They also took the time to explain the benefits of the refrigeration system and provided valuable tips on how to maintain it for optimal performance and energy efficiency.

originalText.text: This company has great customer service and provides affordable repairs for me today. Their technician knew what he was doing and did it professionally. He immediately completed the HVAC air conditioning repair without any fuss and issues. I will never use any other HVAC repair company for future needs. Highly recommended!
